title: Gabatarwa ga HTML
content: HTML na nufin HyperText Markup Language. Yana da harshen asali da ake amfani da shi wajen ƙirƙirar shafukan yanar gizo. HTML yana ba ka damar saka rubutu, hotuna, hanyoyin haɗi, bidiyo da sauran abubuwa a cikin shafin yanar gizo. Yana gaya wa burauza (browser) yadda za a nuna abubuwan da ke cikin shafin. HTML yana amfani da wasu lambobi na musamman da ake kira 'tags'. Kowane shafin yanar gizo da ka gani yana amfani da HTML, har ma da manyan shafuka kamar Google ko Facebook. Koyon HTML shine mataki na farko wajen zama mai ƙirƙirar yanar gizo (web developer).

example.title: Shafin HTML na Asali
example.code:
Sannu, duniya!

Wannan shi ne shafi na farko da na yi da HTML.
example.explanation: Wannan shafi ne mai sauƙi na HTML. Alamar <html> tana rufe dukan shafin. Sashe na <head> yana ɗauke da taken (title), sannan <body> yana ɗauke da abin da zai bayyana kamar taken (heading) da sakin layi (paragraph).

title: Tsarin Asali
content:
Duk wani shafin HTML yana da wata tsari na musamman da ke taimakawa burauza (browser) wajen fahimta da kuma nuna abun cikin shafin daidai. Wannan tsari yana kama da kashin baya (skeletal structure) na shafinka. Ana farawa da wani layi na musamman da ake kira doctype, sannan a hada da muhimman tags kamar <html>, <head>, da <body>.

Ga bayani a kowane sashi:

1. <!DOCTYPE html> – Wannan yana gaya wa burauza cewa kana rubutu ne da HTML5.
2. <html> – Wannan tag ne da ke rufe dukkan shafin HTML. Shi ne tushen (root) sashin.
3. <head> – Wannan bangare ba ya bayyana a shafin. Yana dauke da bayani game da shafin kamar taken sa da hanyoyin haɗi zuwa fayilolin CSS ko fonts.
4. <title> – Wannan shine taken da ke bayyana a saman burauzan (browser tab). Ana sa shi a cikin <head>.
5. <body> – A nan ne ake saka duk abinda kake so mai amfani ya gani kamar taken, rubutu, hotuna, da maballin (buttons).

Yana da matukar muhimmanci ka bi wannan tsarin idan kana son kirkirar shafin HTML mai kyau daidai.

example.title: misalin tsarin html
example.code:
Hello, World!

Welcome to my first web page.
example.explanation: Wannan misali yana nuna tsarin asalin wani takardar HTML. Sashin <head> yana dauke da taken shafin, sannan <body> yana dauke da dukkan abubuwan da masu amfani za su gani. Dukkan shafin HTML ya kamata ya bi wannan tsarin domin ya yi aiki yadda ya kamata.

title: Alamomin HTML
content:
Alamomin HTML su ne tubalan ginin shafin yanar gizo. Suna gaya wa burauzar yadda za a nuna abubuwan da ke cikin shafin. Ana rubuta alamar cikin kunkuntar baka kamar haka:

don sakin layi. Yawancin alamomi suna zuwa da biyu: daya don fara kuma daya don rufe. Alamar rufe tana da alamar / a gabanta, kamar

. Misali:

Sannu

zai nuna kalmar 'Sannu' a matsayin sakin layi. Akwai alamomi da dama a HTML. Kowace alama tana da nasa amfani. Wasu daga cikin shahararrun alamomi sun haɗa da: -

zuwa

don taken shafi -

don sakin layi - don haɗin gizo (link) - don hotuna -

don rarraba ko sarari a cikin shafi Wasu alamomi ba sa buƙatar alamar rufewa. Ana kiran su *alamomi masu kansu*. Misali,
yana ƙara sabuwar layi, kuma yana saka hoto.

example.title: misalinAlama
example.code:
Gidan Yanar Gizona

Wannan shine sakin layi na farko.

Wannan misalin yana amfani da alamomi da dama:

don take,

don sakin layi,
don sabuwar layi, da don hoto. Kowace alama tana gaya wa burauza yadda za a nuna wani abu a shafin.

title: HTML Elements
content:
HTML element shine duk abin da ke tsakanin buɗaɗɗen tag da rufaffiyar tag, har da abinda ke ciki. Yana gaya wa browser menene abun ciki kuma yadda za a nuna shi. Misali, a cikin

Sannu

, element ɗin shine layin gabaɗaya: tag ɗin buɗewa

, kalmar 'Sannu', da tag ɗin rufewa

. Yawancin elements suna bi da wannan tsari: abun ciki a nan Akwai kuma elements masu rufe kansu da kansu (self-closing), waɗanda ba sa da rufaffiyar tag. Waɗannan sun haɗa da
don karyewar layi da don hotuna. Ana iya saka HTML elements a cikin juna. Wannan ana kiransa nesting. Misali, zaka iya saka tag ɗin a cikin tag ɗin

domin yin wani ɓangare na sakin layi bold.

example.title: elementExample
example.code: This is a bold word inside a paragraph.
example.explanation:
Tag ɗin

yana rufe duk sakin layin. A ciki, tag ɗin yana sa kalmar 'bold' ta bayyana da kauri (bold). Wannan yana nuna yadda ake saka elements a cikin juna domin ƙarin tsari.

title: Headings da Paragraphs
content:
Headings da paragraphs ana amfani da su ne wajen tsara rubutu a cikin shafin yanar gizo. Headings suna sanya rubutu ya fi girma kuma ya fi bayyana, ana yawan amfani da su a matsayin take da sunayen sashe. Paragraphs kuma suna dauke da rubutun al’ada. Akwai matakai guda shida na headings a HTML: -

shine mafi girma kuma mafi muhimmanci -

shine mafi kankanta Ya kamata ka yi amfani da headings a cikin tsari, ka fara da

don manyan take, sannan

don kan-take, da dai sauransu. Ana amfani da

don kirkirar paragraph. Ana amfani da shi don rubutu mai tsawo, kamar bayani ko karin haske. Browsers suna kara sarari kai tsaye a gaban da bayan paragraph.

example.title: headingParagraphExample
example.code:
Barka da zuwa Shafina

Game da Ni

Suna na Aisha. Ina son kirkira da tsara shafukan yanar gizo.

Ayyuka

Ga wasu daga cikin ayyukana na baya-bayan nan.
example.explanation:
Wannan misalin yana amfani da

don babban take,

don kan-take na sassa, da

don rubutun paragraph. Yana taimakawa wajen raba shafin zuwa sassa masu saukin karantawa da fahimta.

title: Yadda Ake Yin Kwalliya Ga Rubutu
content:
HTML yana ba ka damar yin wa rubutu kwalliya ta yadda zai bambanta ko ya bayyana cikin wani salo dabam. Za ka iya sa rubutu ya kasance mai kauri (bold), layi (italic), karkace, ko ƙanana. Wannan yana taimakawa wajen jaddada muhimmanci ko canza yadda rubutu ke bayyana.

Ga wasu daga cikin abubuwan kwalliyar rubutu:
- <strong> ko <b> – yana sa rubutu ya zama mai kauri
- <em> ko <i> – yana sa rubutu ya zama karkace
- <u> – yana saka layi a ƙarƙashin rubutu
- <small> – yana rage girman rubutu
- <mark> – yana haskaka rubutu

Wannan kwalliya ana yin ta ne ta saka waɗannan tags a kusa da rubutun da ake son yi wa kwalliya. Ana yawan amfani da su a cikin sakin layi ko kanun labari.

example.title: formattingTextExample
example.code:
Wannan wani rubutu mai kauri ne, wani rubutu karkace, da kuma wani rubutu da aka saka layi ƙarƙashinsa.

Za ka iya haskaka wasu muhimman abubuwa ma.
example.explanation: A wannan misali, <strong> yana sa rubutu ya kaure, <em> yana sa rubutu ya karkace, <u> yana saka layi ƙarƙashin rubutu, sannan <mark> yana haskaka shi. Wannan na taimakawa wajen kyautata karantawa da fahimta.

title: Hanyoyi da Makallan Shafi
content: Hanyoyi suna ba masu amfani damar zuwa daga shafi ɗaya zuwa wani. A HTML, ana ƙirƙirar hanyoyi da alamar . Harafin 'a' yana nufin 'anchor' (maƙalli). Ana amfani da sifar href domin bayyanar da inda burauzan zai tafi. Tsarin asali: Rubutun Hanya Idan mai amfani ya danna rubutun hanyar, zai buɗe URL ɗin. Za ka iya amfani da hanyoyi don zuwa wasu gidajen yanar gizo, buɗe fayiloli, ko tsalle zuwa wani ɓangare na shafi ɗaya.

example.title: misalinHanya
example.code:
Ka ziyarci Google domin ƙarin bayani.

Koma Sama
example.explanation: Hanyar farko tana kai mai amfani zuwa Google. Hanyar ta biyu ita ce maƙallan shafi wadda ke tsallakewa zuwa wani ɓangare na wannan shafin da ke da ID 'top'. Ana amfani da sifar href don bayyana inda hanyar za ta kai.

title: Hotuna a cikin HTML
content: Za ka iya saka hoto a cikin shafinka ta amfani da alamar . Wannan alamar tana nuna hoto daga fayil ko adireshi (URL). Sabanin wasu alamomi, ba ta da alamar rufe ta, wato self-closing ce. Manyan siffofi guda biyu da ake amfani da su sune: - src: Wurin da hoton yake (URL ko hanyar fayil) - alt: Rubutun madadin wanda zai bayyana idan hoton bai loda ba. Hakanan yana taimaka wa masu amfani da na'urorin karanta allo. Hotuna na sa shafukan yanar gizo su kasance masu kayatarwa da ban sha'awa. Ka tabbata ka saka hanyar fayil ɗin daidai.

example.title: imageExample
example.explanation: Hoton farko yana ɗauko fayil ɗin gida mai suna 'logo.png'. Na biyu kuma yana ɗauko hoto daga adireshin intanet. Rubutun alt yana bayyana hoton ga wadanda ba su iya gani ba ko idan hoton ya kasa nunawa.

title: Lists
content:
Ana amfani da jerin don nuna bayani cikin tsari da sauƙin fahimta. HTML yana da manyan nau'ikan jerin guda biyu:

1. Jerin da aka tsara: Ana nuna abubuwa cikin lamba ta amfani da alamar <ol>.
2. Jerin da ba a tsara ba: Ana nuna abubuwa da maki (bullets) ta amfani da alamar <ul>.

Kowane abu a jerin yana amfani da alamar <li>, wanda ke nufin 'abu na jeri'. Jerin na taimakawa wajen sauƙaƙa karantawa da fahimta.

example.title: listExample
example.code:
Jerin da aka tsara:

  1. Koyi HTML
  2. Yi atisaye kullum
  3. Gina ayyuka

Jerin da ba a tsara ba:

  • Madara
  • Burodi
  • Kwai
example.explanation: Jerin farko yana amfani da <ol> don matakai masu lamba. Jerin na biyu yana amfani da <ul> don abubuwan da ke da maki. Kowane abu yana cikin alamar <li>.

title: Mahadar yanar gizo a HTML
content:
Hanyoyi (links) suna bai wa masu amfani damar motsawa daga shafi zuwa wani. A HTML, ana ƙirƙirar hanyoyi ta amfani da alamar <a>, wanda ke nufin 'anchor'.

Alamar <a> tana amfani da ƙarin href don bayyana inda hanyar ke nufi (URL). Masu amfani za su iya danna rubutun hanyar domin buɗe wani shafi ko fayil.

Za ka iya haɗa da wasu gidajen yanar gizo ko kuma zuwa wasu sassa na shafinka.

example.title: linkExample
example.code:
Ka ziyarci Shafin Farko.

Aika mana da imel zuwa info@example.com.
example.explanation: Hanya ta farko tana buɗe wani gidan yanar gizo. Ta biyu tana amfani da 'mailto:' don buɗe manhajar imel. Rubutun da ke tsakanin da shi ne abin da ake danna.

title: Tabura a cikin HTML
content:
Jadawali ana amfani da su ne don nuna bayanai a layuka da ginshiƙai. A HTML, ana ƙirƙirar jadawali ta amfani da alamar <table>. A cikin tebur, <tr> tana nuna layi, <th> tana nuna cell ɗin take, sannan <td> tana nuna cell ɗin bayanai na yau da kullum.

Jadawali suna taimakawa wajen tsara abun ciki kamar jadawalin lokaci, farashi, ko jerin abubuwa cikin tsari mai kyau.

example.title: tableExample
example.explanation: Alamar <table> tana rufe duka jadawalin. Kowanne <tr> layi ne. A cikin layi, <th> ana amfani da shi don taken ginshiƙai kuma <td> don bayanai na yau da kullum.

title: Sassa na HTML (div)
content:
Alamar <div> wata alama ce ta matakin block wadda ake amfani da ita wajen haɗa abubuwan HTML wuri guda. Yana taimakawa wajen tsara shafin ka da kuma amfani da salo ko tsarin zane cikin sauƙi. Yi tunanin <div> kamar akwati ne da ke riƙe da wasu abubuwa.

Ba ya canza yadda abubuwa suke bayyana da kansa, amma yana da matuƙar amfani idan ana zane da ƙawata shafukan yanar gizo.

example.title: divExample
example.code:
Welcome

This is a simple webpage section inside a div.
example.explanation: Wannan misalin yana rufe take da sakin layi a cikin <div>. Daga baya zaka iya ƙara salo zuwa <div> domin canza yadda yake bayyana.

title: HTML Forms da Shigar da bayanai
content:
HTML forms na ba masu amfani damar shigar da bayanai, kamar suna, imel, ko kalmar sirri. Ana amfani da forms idan kana so ka tara bayani daga masu amfani ka tura shi zuwa uwar garke.

<form> tag tana rufe duk abubuwan da ke cikin form. A cikin form, ana amfani da nau’o’in <input> daban-daban kamar text, email, password, da sauransu.

example.title: formExample
example.code:
<form>
  <label for="name">Name:</label>
  <input type="text" id="name" name="name">

  <label for="email">Email:</label>
  <input type="email" id="email" name="email">

  <input type="submit" value="Submit">
</form>
example.explanation: Wannan form yana da filaye guda biyu: ɗaya don suna da ɗaya don imel. <input type="submit"> yana ƙara maɓallin aika bayanan form ɗin.

title: HTML da CSS
content:
HTML na ƙirƙirar tsarin shafin yanar gizo — kamar taken shafi, rubutu, da hotuna. CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) na bada salon shafi — canza launi, nau'in rubutu, girma, da tsari.

Za ka iya rubuta CSS a cikin HTML ta amfani da <style> tag, ko haɗa wani fayil daban na CSS ta amfani da <link>.

example.title: cssExample
example.code:
Hello CSS

This page has a light blue background and styled text.
example.explanation: <style> tag tana ƙara CSS a cikin HTML. Tana canza launin bango kuma tana sanya taken shafi ya zama shuɗi mai duhu kuma ya zauna a tsakiya.

title: Amfani da Stylesheets
content:
Stylesheet fayil ne da ke ɗauke da lambar CSS. Za ka iya haɗa fayil ɗin CSS da HTML ɗinka don daidaito. Wannan ana kiransa external stylesheet.

Amfani da stylesheet yana sauƙaƙa wa don kayyade salo iri ɗaya a shafuka da dama.

example.title: linkStylesheetExample
example.code: This is styled using CSS
example.explanation: <link> tag a cikin <head> yana haɗa da fayil mai suna styles.css. Wannan fayil ɗin ne ke ɗauke da dokokin CSS da za su saita salo ga HTML ɗin.

title: Aiyukan yi
content: Mu gina karamin shafin yanar gizo na kanka ta amfani da duk abin da ka koya zuwa yanzu. Wannan zai hada da headings, paragraphs, hotuna, links, tebur, da fom ɗin tuntuɓa.

steps.stepDescription:
Yi amfani da

don sunanka da

don taƙaitaccen bayani game da kanka.
Yi amfani da don saka hoton kai ko wani hoto da kake so.
Ƙirƙiri sauƙaƙen tebur da ginshiƙai kamar 'Sha'awa' da 'Bayani'.
Haɗa zuwa shafin da kake so ko social media ta amfani da <a> tag.
Yi amfani da <form>, <input>, da <textarea> don mutane su iya tuntuɓarka.
Haɗa da external CSS file sannan ka ƙara salo mai sauƙi kamar font da launin bango.

Visit my blog
example.explanation: Wannan misali yana nuna yadda zaka haɗa duk abin da ka koya don ƙirƙirar shafin yanar gizo na gaske.

title: Kyawawan Dabaru
content: Bin kyawawan dabaru yana taimaka maka ka rubuta tsabtaccen, karantacce, kuma mai sauƙin fahimta na HTML. Ga wasu shawarwari da za ka riƙa bi yayin da kake ci gaba da koya da gina shafuka.

steps.stepDescription: Ka fara takardunka na HTML da <!DOCTYPE html> don tabbatar da daidaito a dukkan burauzoci.

steps.stepTitle: 2. Riƙe Lambar da Tsari da Tsabta
steps.stepDescription: Yi amfani da tsara mai kyau (sarari 2 ko 4) don lambar ta zama karantacciya.
Yi amfani da tags kamar <header>, <nav>, <main>, <section>, da <footer> don nuna tsarin shafinka.
Ka ƙara 'alt' ga kowanne hoto don masu amfani da ke da nakasa da kuma don inganta SEO.

steps.stepTitle: 5. Yi Amfani da CSS na Waje
steps.stepDescription: Riƙa saka salon CSS a cikin fayil daban don HTML ɗinka ya zama mai tsafta.
Kada ka rubuta CSS a cikin HTML kai tsaye (misali: style="color:red"). Yi amfani da ajin CSS maimakon haka.

steps.stepTitle: 7. Yi Amfani da Sunaye Masu Ma’ana don Class da ID
steps.stepDescription: Yi amfani da sunaye kamar 'main-content' ko 'nav-bar', ba kamar 'box1' ba.
Yi amfani da kayan aiki kamar W3C HTML Validator don bincikar kurakurai da inganta lambar.
Ka duba shafinka a burauzoci daban-daban don tabbatar da cewa yana aiki da kyau ko’ina.

steps.stepTitle: 10. Ci gaba da Koyo da Aiki
steps.stepDescription: HTML yana ci gaba da haɓaka, don haka ka kasance mai sabunta kanka kuma kana gwada sabbin abubuwa.

example.title: semanticExample
example.code:
My Portfolio

About Me

I am a web developer learning HTML.

© 2025 My Name
example.explanation: Wannan misali yana amfani da semantic tags don bayyana tsarin shafi cikin sauƙi da fahimta.
